title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 46.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 46.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part establishes minimum standards for benefit levels, benefits eligibility and exclusion, and premium levels relating to additional benefits authorized under section
1113 (a)(1)
of the Insurance Law for unemployment lapse protection benefits for life insurance. The unemployment lapse protection benefit includes waiver of premium benefits and waiver of charge benefits. This Part also provides advertising and disclosure requirements for unemployment lapse protection benefits for life insurance. Notes

46.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
